paper_abstract: We introduce the notion of the (one-parameter subgroup) gamma-condition for a map f from a Lie group to its Lie algebra and establish alpha-theory and gamma-theory for Newton's method for a map f satisfying this condition. Applications to analytic maps are provided, and Smale's alpha-theory and gamma-theory are extended and developed. Examples arising from initial value problems on Lie group are presented to illustrate applications of our results. (C) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Smale's point estimate theory for Newton's method on Lie groups
